data_table.description: Clinic Exam Data: Interview, Physical Exam, ECG, Original Cohort Exam 31. Surviving original cohort participants were invited to participate in the 31st follow-up examination. The examination included a physician-administered medical history interview (or for examinations that occurred outside the research clinic, a technician-administered interview), technician-administered questionnaires to assess cognitive and physical function, and clinical measurements (anthropometrics, ECG and physical performance measures).

Most or all of the time (5-7 days)
